articles.title: Actor Kai Ko on his exes: 'The one I wanted to marry was Elva Hsiao, but the one I liked most was Tia Lee' - AsiaOne

articles.title: Take COVID-19 Vaccine At "First Available Opportunity": WHO To Indians - NDTV
articles.description: World Health Organisation (WHO) Regional Director for South East Asia Dr Poonam Khetrapal Singh today issued a word of caution as India is witnessing a "plateau" in daily COVID-19 cases, advising people to get the shots as soon as possible.
